name: PaperCast-AI
description: An AI-powered application that transforms research papers into engaging podcast-style conversations, making academic content more accessible and entertaining.
features: AI Summarization – Converts technical content into natural dialogue using Google's Gemini AI
PDF Processing – Extracts and processes research papers in PDF format
Natural Voice Synthesis – Generates human-like voices with Kokoro TTS
Interactive Web Interface – Built using Streamlit for a seamless user experience
Dynamic Content Scaling – Adjusts conversation length based on paper size
Multi-Voice Simulation – Features AI-generated dialogues between two hosts

name: AutoScribe
description: An AI-driven system that automates article research, writing, and editing using multiple specialized agents.
features: Multi-Agent Collaboration – Uses Planner, Writer, and Editor agents for structured content creation
Automated Research & Writing – Plans, writes, and refines articles on any topic
SEO Optimization – Incorporates relevant keywords for better search visibility
Mistral AI-Powered – Utilizes Mistral-small via API for content generation
Interactive CLI Workflow – Users can input topics directly through the command line
Markdown Output – Generates well-formatted articles ready for publishing

name: Llama 3.2 Fine-tuning (Reasoning)
description: A fine-tuned LLaMA 3.2 (3B) model optimized for enhanced reasoning capabilities using Unsloth.
features: Dataset – Fine-tuned on GSM8K for improved mathematical and logical reasoning
Optimized Training – Leveraged Unsloth for efficient fine-tuning and faster inference
Enhanced Reasoning – Achieves superior performance in complex problem-solving tasks

name: VirtualCalC
description: A hand gesture-based virtual calculator that enables touch-free arithmetic operations using a webcam.
features: Gesture Recognition – Tracks and interprets finger movements for number and operation input
AI-Powered Calculation – Utilizes the Gemini API for real-time computations
Touch-Free Interaction – Provides an interactive and accessible user experience
Live Display – Shows calculations instantly on the screen

name: CookSnap
description: An AI-powered recipe generator that analyzes images of ingredients and provides personalized cooking instructions.
features: Image-Based Ingredient Detection – Uses Gemini Pro Vision to recognize ingredients from images
AI-Generated Recipes – Leverages the Google GenerativeAI API for tailored recipe suggestions
Natural Language Understanding – Provides detailed, easy-to-follow cooking instructions
